column2: "Na Israel mbabanyin a wɔbaa Egypt no hɔn edzin nye yi; ɔbanyin biara nye ne fifo kaa Jakob ho bae."
"Reuben
"Isakar
"Dan nye Naftali
"Na akra a wofi Jakob n’asen mu nyinara yɛ eduosuon: nna Josef wɔ Egypt dada."
"Na Josef
"Na Israelmba no wowoe
column5: na hɔn ho yɛɛ dzen papaara; na wɔhyɛɛ asaase no do ma."

column2: "Na ɔhen fofor bi soɛree wɔ Egypt a nna onnyim Josef."
"Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ ne man dɛ
column5: na hɔn ho yɛ dzen sen hɛn:"

column2: "hom mbra ma yɛnye hɔn ndzi no nyansa mu
column4: na aammba dɛ sɛ ɔsa bi ba a
column5: wɔaannkɛka hɛn atamfo ho nye hɛn ammbɔko
column6: na woeenntu emmfi asaase yi do annkɔ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔhyehyɛɛ abɔmbaafo wɔ hɔn do dɛ wɔmma hɔn ndzesoadze nhyɛ hɔn do. Na wɔkyekyeer adzekora nkurow
"Na mber dodow a wɔtseetsee hɔn kɛse no mbom na wɔdɔɔr kɛse na wɔtrɛe. Na Israelmba ho nketsenketse kyeer hɔn."
"Na Egyptfo yɛɛ Israelmba ma wodzii suhia:"
"na wɔmaa hɔn asetsena foon hɔn wɔ ndwumadzen mu
column4: nye hamudwuma ahorow nyinara mu. Na wɔmaa wodzii suhia wɔ hɔn som nyinara mu."

column2: "Na Egypthen no kasaa kyerɛɛ Hebriwfo awogyefo a hɔn mu kor ne dzin dze Sifra
column3: na ɔbaako so ne dzin dze Pua no:"

column2: "na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom regye Hebriwfo mbaa no awoo
column4: na hom hu wɔ awoo egua no do dɛ ɔyɛ ɔbanyin a
column5: ɔno hom nku no; na sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbabaa a

column2: "Na awogyefo no suroo Nyankopɔn
column3: na wɔannyɛ dɛ mbrɛ Egypthen no hyɛɛ hɔn no
column4: na mbom wɔgyee mbanyimba no nkwa."

column2: "Na Egypthen no frɛɛ awogyefo no
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ayɛ dɛm adze yi
column5: na hom agye mba mbanyimba no nkwa yi?"

column2: "Na awogyefo no see Farao dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ Hebriwfo mbaa no wɔnntse dɛ Egyptfo mbaa; na hɔn dze
column5: na awogyefo nnyae nndur hɔn nkyɛn mpo nna wɔawo dada."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn nye awogyefo no dzii no yie: na nkorɔfo no hɔn dodow dɔɔ so
column3: na hɔn ho yɛɛ dzen pii."

column2: "Na osiandɛ
"Na Farao hyɛɛ no nkorɔfo nyinara dɛ
column3: Ɔbabanyin biara a wɔbɔwo no no
column4: hom nkɔtow no nkyen esutsen no mu
